document.id: Pueblo de San Ildefonso Council Res. No. SI-R17-020
document.heading: PUEBLO DE SAN ILDEFONSO COUNCIL RESOLUTION NO. SI-R17-020
Act Adopting and Ratifying the 2014 Master Land Use Plan Scheme 3
document.preamble: At a duly called meeting of the Council of San Ildefonso Pueblo on the 7th day of July, 2017, the following Resolution was adopted:

recital.text: the Pueblo de San Ildefonso ("Pueblo') is a sovereign and self-governing Tribe, recognized as such by the United States of America; and

the voters of the Pueblo approved a Governing Agreement ("Agreement") for the Pueblo on November 19, 2011, and the Bureau of Indian Affairs approved the Agreement on December 21, 2011, pursuant to Federal law; and
the Council is authorized to make laws for the Pueblo pursuant to Section 5 of the Agreement; and

the Council has determined the need to adopt and ratify a selection of one of the schematics from the 2014 Land Use Plan that were prepared for the Pueblo de San Ildefonso; three (3) viable alternatives were provided and discussed and the Tribal Council would like to adopt and ratify the selection of Scheme 3 for use in the Community Master Plan.
that the Council hereby enacts the attached law, "ACT ADOPTING AND RATIFYING THE 2014 MASTER LAND USE PLAN SCHEME 3."

procedural-data.text: The foregoing resolution was duly voted upon by the Council on July 7, 2017, at a meeting with a vote of in favor, opposed, abstaining and absent (Governor presiding and not voting) pursuant to the authority vested in the Council by the Agreement of the Pueblo de San Ildefonso.
COUNCIL REPRESENTATIVE SPONSOR(S): Lt. Governor Christopher A. Moquino
DELIVERY OF THE RESOLUTION TO THE GOVERNOR:

Resolution No. SI-R17-020 was presented to the Governor of the Pueblo de San Ildefonso on the 7th day of July, 2017, pursuant to the Governing document of the Pueblo de San Ildefonso ("Agreement"), GOVERNOR, Sec. 4(c), and will become effective after signature by the Governor or veto override by the Council.

attachment.heading: ACT ADOPTING AND RATIFYING THE 2014 MASTER LAND USE PLAN SCHEME 3

section.heading: Short Title
section.text: This enactment shall be known as the "ACT ADOPTING AND RATIFYING THE 2014 MASTER LAND USE PLAN SCHEME 3 ("Act")."

section.heading: Purpose
section.text: The purpose of this Act is to adopt and ratify a selection of one of the "Schemes (schematics)" from the 3 Schemes (options) outlined in the 2014 Master Land Use Plan, a study which was contracted through the Northern Pueblos Housing Authority and prepared for the Pueblo de San Ildefonso.

section.heading: Findings
section.text: The Council hereby finds and declares that:

para.text: The Pueblo, through the Northern Pueblos Housing Authority, contracted a study by Indigenous Design Studio + Architecture, LLC, to examine land use within the Pueblo boundaries, and as a result, the 2014 Land Use Plan (report) was developed.

The 2014 Land Use Plan has been provided to the Pueblo de San Ildefonso through both hard copy and electronic forms, provided to the Executive and Legislative Branches, as well as housed at the Northern Pueblos Housing Authority offices.
The 2014 Land Use Plan that was prepared for the Pueblo identifies 3 Schemes (or schematics) as options for use as a foundation to do further, detailed land use planning.

The Council understands that none of the 3 Schemes currently fit the dynamic of the stages of planning and development that has been and is occurring since the document was presented in 2014, however, in order to continue enhancing and preparing for planning, preparation and development, one selection is needed to move forward.

In order for pueblo to proceed into the next phase of developing a Master Community Land Use Plan, the Council needs to select one "Scheme" from the 2014 Land Use Plan as a basis to work off of and to use as a framework for long-term planning.
The Council has determined the need to adopt and ratify a selection of one of the schematics from three (3) viable alternatives that were provided and discussed.
The Council has chosen to adopt and ratify the selection of 'Scheme 3' for use in development of the Master Community Plan. A copy of Scheme 3 is attached as Exhibit A.

section.heading: Authorizations
section.text: The Council hereby approves and adopts this resolution in accordance with the requirements of the Agreement, according to published Council procedures, and authorizes and directs the Governor or his designee to take such actions as deemed necessary to carry out the intent of this resolution.
